snippet: It is the first time Mayor Bill de Blasio’s administration has elected to shut down any noncharter public schools.
abstract: New York City Education Dept says it will shutter Bedford-Stuyvesant public schools Peace Academy Middle School, School for the Urban Environment and Foundations Academy High School; is first time Mayor Bill de Blasio administration has elected to close non-charter schools; while three Brooklyn schools struggled with low enrollment and poor performance, closures marks departure for administration that has favored rehabilitating schools over closing them.
lead_paragraph: It is the first time Mayor Bill de Blasio’s administration has elected to shut down any noncharter public schools.
